about_the_game: Experience the art book and music soundtrack from Wales Interactive's sci-fi adventure horror Master Reboot. The 54 page art book features unseen behind the scenes concept work used in the creation of the game and is a real insight into the developers minds. The sound track includes 24 tracks that feature throughout the game including the games memorable end song "Travelling Through Time".
detailed_description: Experience the art book and music soundtrack from Wales Interactive's sci-fi adventure horror Master Reboot. The 54 page art book features unseen behind the scenes concept work used in the creation of the game and is a real insight into the developers minds. The sound track includes 24 tracks that feature throughout the game including the games memorable end song "Travelling Through Time".

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X Version 10.6.3 or later
  • Processor: 1.6GHz (Dual Core) Intel CPU
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: At least Intel HD 4000 or Open GL 3.3 /
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X Version 10.6.3 or later
  • Processor: 2.2GHz (Quad Core) Intel CPU
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6750M 512MB
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo, AMD Athlon64 x2, or better
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 3 Compatible
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5/i7, AMD equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 280, ATI Radeon 4870 or better
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
